name: Huggers gonna hug
description:
Let's fight hate with hugs!

Just a quick prototype to join the #ResistJam!

Known issues: the browser version sometimes lose framerate.

Commands
  • LEFT/RIGHT or A/D to turn left/right
  • SPACE to use power
Diversifiers

This is how it Feels

The game raises awareness of how hate speech or unfair accusations feel, and what kind of effect they have on their targets.

Hardware Accessibility

Can be played in browser or on low-end netbook.

Nevertheless, She Persisted

A character stands as one against many.

Other Shoes

Make a positive portrayal of someone with a different life experience from your own.

Audio Credits
  • 8-bit-Arcade4 by DL Sounds
  • Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt opening
